text: aagaah raho ki ibaadat to khaas khuda hee ke lie hai aur jin logon ne khuda ke siva (auron ko apana) saraparast bana rakha hai aur kahate hain ki ham to unakee parasatish sirf isalie karate hain ki ye log khuda kee baaragaah mein hamaara taqarrab badha degen isamen shak nahin ki jis baat mein ye log jhagadate hain (qayaamat ke din) khuda unake daramiyaan isamen phaisala kar dega beshak khuda jhoothe naashukre ko manzile maqasood tak nahin pahunchaaya karata
